page.title: 07The elderly & social concern
page.content: The Elderly of Friendship Club has a membership of 36, 15-20 attending each meeting. The club meets every fortnight and has outings, speakers, discussions, slides, whist drives and bingo. They transport themselves to meetings. There is no outside fund raising. Money is raised by subscriptions, bring and buys, donations received from other organistations. Meals on Wheels are delivered three times a week. Kitchens at Eternit(Meldreth) prepare the meals and volunteers from Shepreth, Barrington and Foxton serve them.
